title: Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients: 1 Cup Milk, 1 Cup Cheddar Cheese, 1/2 Scoop Margarine, 2 Cups Macaroni Noodles
recipe: First, boil the noodles. Then, make the sauce. Then, mix all together! Finally, eat!
commentary: One of my favorite meals! I cook this all the time!

title: Yummy Testpost Version 2!
ingredients: 1oz Pancakes, 2oz Granulated Sugar, 100 Metric Tons of Salt
recipe: To make a testpost, you need the tears of a dev
commentary: I really enjoy testposts! Eat them with your friends!
